Equipment Actions.Action 1: War Pick, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 5ft, Average Damage: 6 Piercing
Equipment Actions.Action 2: Javeling, Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack, Range: 5ft or 30/120ft, Average Damage: 5 Piercing

Other Actions.Action 1: Enlarge, The Durgar magically increases in size, along with anything it is wearing or carrying.  While enlarged, the Duergar is Large, doubles its damage dice on Strength-based weapon attacks, and makes Strength checks and Strength saving throws with advantage
Other Actions.Action 2: Invisibility, The Duergar magically turns invisible until it attacks, casts a spell, uses Enlarge, or until its concentration is broken

Abilities.Ability 1: Duergar Resilience, The Duergar has advantage on saving throws against poison, spells, illusions, being charmed and paralyzed
Abilities.Ability 2: Sunlight Sensitivity, The Duergar has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight while in sunlight
